website_summaries.verdict: A heavy-duty steel garden tool organizer that holds an impressive amount of gardening gear. An ideal garage storage solution for large, heavy gardening tools.
pros: Strong steel frame holds up to 200 pounds
Offers ample room for both large and small gardening tools, providing a complete and superbly versatile storage solution
Wall-mounted design saves valuable floor space
Robust construction is built to last

customer_reviews.title: Hands down the very best tool rack I have ever purchased
customer_reviews.text: Hands down the very best tool rack I have ever purchased. I was tired of plastic racks that broke constantly. This product is well built, well engineered and exceptional.
customer_reviews.author: Derek K. Lorenz

customer_reviews.title: This is what I call HEAVY DUTY!
customer_reviews.text: We purchased a new house and I went to work on the garage. I bought a tool rack at the local home improvement store - they had 2 to choose from. Went to install it... junk! Was not going to stand up to any real tools. Went online - looked around - found this gem. WOW! Could not be happier. This thing is rock solid. It is never going to fail and it can hold anything I need to hang on it. Everyone that has come over to see my garage? Loves it! All are very impressed. This is a can't miss.
customer_reviews.author: Old School Fan

customer_reviews.title: Oh man... garage storage GAME-CHANGER.
customer_reviews.text: I absolutely love this product. It is a total game-changer. We went from a broken, worthless system that woudln't even hold a season's worth of gear, to holding every type of shovel, rake, broom and yard tool I could find. My only gripe is that one of the silver pegs that you must insert to hold the attachments in was faulty. The little belly-button type bump wouldn't move in to allow it to go through the holes. Eventually I gave up and used a hammer to gently tap it through the holes. I wouldn't hesitate to buy another, but it fits EVERYTHING I have, so I don't even need it!
customer_reviews.author: The Sueb

customer_reviews.title: POOR QUALITY..... it does not go together!!!!
customer_reviews.text: How DISAPPOINTED I am with my Storage Board.... I am NOT satisfied with the QUALITY at all!! Does Omni have ANY quality check! The mounting brackets have to pounded onto the mounting bar and the brackets have to be drilled out to fit onto the bar. I REALLY want to return it BUT the box is destroyed and I have so many pieces I do not know how I would box it up. In am thinking I will just NOT pay for the item on my credit card. What do I do/?? I am disgusted with it!
customer_reviews.author: Jere K. Ericson

customer_reviews.title: Bomb Proof Tool Storage
customer_reviews.text: After suffering with a Home Depot plastic tool storage system for years and having tools fall down if a breeze rolls past it, this is a replacement that will last as long as the house stands. I hung shovels, rakes and my string trimmer from it so far and I have no concerns about its durability and functionality. It's a bit on the pricey side, but it seems like a buy it for life item and I'm very happy with it.
customer_reviews.author: Brent

customer_reviews.title: strong sturdy and versatile
customer_reviews.text: Company sent wrong storage rack and when realized contacted me and immediately sent the right rack. It is sturdy, strong and very efficient and versatile. You can use it for a whole host of things. Company integrity is great. Assembly was quick and easy. Thanks for your cooperation. I will highly recommend this product.
customer_reviews.author: CF

customer_reviews.title: Easy to install and very flexible for configuration to hang what you need to hang
customer_reviews.text: We have been looking for a garage organizer that could fit how we wanted to organize our garage. This product was easy to install, VERY sturdy for even the heavy stuff. Multiple tools on one holder made it even easier to save space. We put two units side by side and had enough room to store all of our our shovels, snow shovels, rakes, axes, weedeater and more. A bit pricey but well worth it versus other alternatives we tried or considered.
customer_reviews.author: Davison Dulin

customer_reviews.title: Total Crap...DO NOT BUY -
customer_reviews.text: The mounting bar does not slide thru the mounting bracket holes. Either bar is too big or holes in brackets are too small. Tried calling support 800 number (800 701-3743) and it no longer in service. Totally disappointed by this product and will not purchase this brand again. It's too bad, it looked like a good rack, but I would recommend staying away from this rack. Updated 05/08 - I worked with Jenny from OmniRack and she was awesome. She was able to get my refund to me asap. I was disappointed with the rack, but if it wasn't defective, it probably would've been a good rack. Thanks to Jenny for working with me and getting things straightened-out.
customer_reviews.author: KK

customer_reviews.title: Tube won't fit through bracket holes
customer_reviews.text: Horizontal tube will not fit through holes in mounting bracket Customer service telephone number on the insert with the package has been disconnected. I looked up the phone number for the company selling this item on google and was connected to a customer service person who does sales who has no technical expertise. After that person wasting my time on the phone it was too late to call the technical service people because their office had closed. Now I have the mounting brackets installed in my studs and can't get the holder in the holes. Not happy.
customer_reviews.author: lisa v.

customer_reviews.title: Very sturdy storage rack
customer_reviews.text: This is a sturdy storage rack and easy to install on the exposed studs in my garage. I bought just 1 of these initially try it out. I ended up buying 2 more of these for the rest of my yard tools. The only issue I have with the latest 2 racks is that I had to enlarge the holes in some of the attachments by 1/32" in order for the pins to slide through the attachments and track. The holes did not line up close enough for the pins to easily slide through.
customer_reviews.author: Sobieski Wi

customer_reviews.title: Well made product
customer_reviews.text: I am able to hang many tools and heavy ones as well on this tool holder. Installation was a breeze, very straight forward. I spent most of my time figuring out the most effecient way to hang my tools. For the amount of money I paid, I thought it could have been another 8 inches longer. That would have earned it 5 stars on my review.
customer_reviews.author: Jp

customer_reviews.title: A superior product
customer_reviews.text: I used two of the tool storage racks to reduce the clutter of garden tools (including electric leaf blowers, etc), ladders, snow shovels, push brooms, etc. The system is infinitely flexible, and stores far more than you would imagine in each 44" section. It's helpful to have someone assist, but if you're especially handy, you can do it yourself. Very, very high quality and an ingenious design. Highly recommended.
customer_reviews.author: SFNM Customer

customer_reviews.title: Satisfied!
customer_reviews.text: Very sturdy. High Quality. Before ordering, I checked the least favorable reviews. Most of them said they had problems with the bar fitting through the support brackets or the hanger pins fitting through the holes in the bar. The company must have taken these complaints to heart because everything on mine fit perfectly. One other reviewer said that the supporting screws were inadequate. Again, StoreYour Board must have been listening because mine were 2.5-inch hex-head (easy to install with socket wrench) lug screws. The only way this thing is coming down is if it brings the garage with it.
customer_reviews.author: Giacomo

customer_reviews.title: Fantastic storage unit
customer_reviews.text: I'm a 73 year old woman who was able to install this easily. Good instructions, sturdy construction and it exceeded my expectations. I plan to order another one for my ladders. I bought a 2nd storage rack. The mounting bar was too big to fit in the wall brackets and the attachment holes would not line up with the mounting bar holes. I e-mailed Store Your Board and received quick response and within a few days a new mounting bar and wall brackets. Second storage rack is now loaded and finished organizing my garage. Very happy with the customer service and prompt replacement.
customer_reviews.author: GrandmaDiana

customer_reviews.title: Solid, easy to install
customer_reviews.text: This is a very nice rack. Easy to install, no issues putting it together in about 20 minutes. Minimum tools necessary. Although I installed it only 2 weeks ago, I have no doubt it would last a long time. I only wish it was a bit wider, to allow for wider spacing between attachments, but this is just my preference.
customer_reviews.author: Andrey S.

customer_reviews.title: Horrible product quality control
customer_reviews.text: Product control on this is horrible. The brackets that go on the bar won’t fit unless your bore out the bracket whole. The pins that hold the movable arms to the bar don’t fit in half the wholes. I made it work because I hate dealing with returns but I’d never recommend this product to anyone else. Seller did reach out to try and correct the problem (so I moved it up to 3 stars). I’m sure they would have replaced it. But I already installed it so I’m not going to mess with it.
customer_reviews.author: T Shoemaker

customer_reviews.title: Great sturdy storage rack
customer_reviews.text: It took both my husband and myself to install this. We bought 2 so we could store even more items. It’s super sturdy now that they are installed. The screws used to install were long and thick. We had to use part of a 2x4 and nailed it to the stud before installing it to ensure the screws did not go through the wall on the outside of our metal garage. I would recommend them due to their superb flexibility (being able to put the hooks wherever you want) and the sturdiness.
customer_reviews.author: P. Coble

customer_reviews.title: Definitely Worth the Purchase!!
customer_reviews.text: Installing this product was extremely easy. The directions were very easy to follow; you can most likely figure out how to install it without looking at the directions once. I love how many rack attachments this comes with. There is more than enough space to hang multiple garden tools, including my weed whacker! The garage looks so much more organized with this product in use. I would buy this again in a heartbeat.
customer_reviews.author: Brandon

customer_reviews.title: Great Product
customer_reviews.text: Took me approximately 20 minutes to install. This product is very sturdy and should last for years. Yes it is a little more expensive than other similar items, but it's not plastic like many of the others. The large hooks easily hold my leaf blower, edger and gardening tools. The smaller hooks hold my broom, rake etc. Overall I recommend this product to anyone who's looking to organize their garage or shed. I am going to order another one of these soon.
customer_reviews.author: Nuke2212

customer_reviews.title: Poorly manufactured
customer_reviews.text: None of the holes for the mounting brackets or accessory arms line up with the bar. The poorest manufactured item I’ve received. I had to use a hammer to get the mounting brackets on and had to purchase additional nuts and screws to attach the accessory arms as the holes were too far off for the pins that were shipped with the product to fit. I contacted Amazon to attempt to get a new one however I was told the one I already had mounted to studs in my garage had to be removed and returned. Not worth my time or effort so I just made do with the poorly manufactured product.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Use on wood studs. DO NOT USE CONCRETE ANCHORS.
customer_reviews.text: The first one I bought worked great, but the second is sitting in the garage. Install wasn't bad until you get to the point of getting the rod through the holders. The fit is incredibly tight (for a reason) and I had to use a hammer to get it through. First install into wood studs on drywall, no problem. Second install into concrete with Tapcon anchors was not so good. Trying to hammer the rod in ripped the holder from the wall. *sigh*
customer_reviews.author: Hopkins_Geek

customer_reviews.title: *total crap * parts don't fit * unusable
customer_reviews.text: We ordered two racks. Both racks are total junk. Wall brackets won't fit over tube, nor will hanger brackets. Hanger bracket holes don't line up with tube holes so pins can't be inserted. Products are totally unusable. Very upset. Tried to phone help number on directions sheet--disconnected! Then phoned number on web site and got a call center. They asked me to email photos of the problems which I did. "Someone will respond within 24 hours." POSTSCRIPT: Nine days later no one has responded.
customer_reviews.author: Gregory N. Brown

customer_reviews.title: Should be One Foot Longer!
customer_reviews.text: This is a sturdy product which comes with every thing you need (hardware, hooks, lag bolts etc.). My only complaint is that the unit is about a foot short. I couldn't utilize one of the three extended forks due to space limitations. My recommendation to the builder is make it a little longer and all of the attachments will fit! I was able to place an edger, golf clubs, 5 sand chairs, various bush clippers, a number of brooms and shovels!
customer_reviews.author: Joe H.

customer_reviews.title: Works Great!
customer_reviews.text: Easy to mount. You can simply slide the mounting hardware to line up with the studs in the wall. You'll need your own drill & stud finder. I have a snow shovel, huge rake, small step stairs, several brooms & mops, my dog throw toy on it now with room to spare. Very sturdy. It's priced at the high end for such things but worth it in my opinion. Very Happy. Be sure to mount it high enough that you don't poke yourself in the head with it but not so high that your rake doesn't hit the ceiling when hanging it.
customer_reviews.author: DadMan

customer_reviews.title: So easy to install and very stable
customer_reviews.text: I purchased the bike rack model of this prior, and I was so happy with it that I bought this Tool Storage Rack (Max) to hang my gardening tools, snow shovels, and other misc items that were just leaned against walls or sitting on the floor of my garage. Installation was a breeze by myself (less than 30 mins), and it is extremely stable. It's a bit on the pricier side compared to other similar models, but I'd say it's worth it.
customer_reviews.author: J. Pak

customer_reviews.title: Easy to mount on the wall and strong!
customer_reviews.text: Bought this to replace a very old organizer in my garage. Easy to mount to the wall studs, quick assembly, and I really like how well-made and strength of the design. It has really helped me organize so many loose pieces and parts that were laying all around my garage. Very happy with the quality and looking forward to years of use.
customer_reviews.author: Vols FAN

customer_reviews.title: So good I purchased a 2nd.
customer_reviews.text: This is not one of those plastic, or spring loaded hooks. I have weed eaters, blower, shovels, heavy dirt/rock rakes, shop brooms, & even a 100' water hose. Best wall hanging storage rack, with very easy access I ever had. Liked it so much I purchased a 2nd one.
customer_reviews.author: ffinstructor2

customer_reviews.title: Very nice product
customer_reviews.text: I do not think I have ever given a 5 star review- until now. This is a really nicely engineered and well made unit. The finish is great- everything smooth and painted nicely. It went together just as easily and the instructions are top notch. I really cannot find anything negative to say about it. Not cheap but worth every penny.
customer_reviews.author: jAndrew

customer_reviews.title: Great for garage cleanup
customer_reviews.text: I bought a house with a two car garage that is not very deep. It fits two cars and my workbench and that is about it. After collecting multiple rakes and shovels, I was getting frustrated with having nowhere to put them and until I have the time and money to build a shed, this was a great option. You'll need a stud finder and a drill with a socket attachment. Had it up in 10 minutes and garage is looking a lot neater!
customer_reviews.author: Matthew Hickey

customer_reviews.title: great product
customer_reviews.text: Great organization for garage. All the clutter in the corner is now hung neatly. Easy to see what we have and easy access. The only reason this is not 5 stars is the pins do not line up evenly so takes some effort with hammer to get in place. Other than that, couldn't ask for anything better.
customer_reviews.author: cdk

customer_reviews.title: This is a great item!!!
customer_reviews.text: This is the best organize investment tool in for you garage. This thing is very durable! Only pointer is when trying to fit on the two wall mounting sliders to the storage rack, I had to use a hammer and slightly bang it until it fit on there. The Max Heavy Duty Kit comes with 4 Maxed rack hangers and 2 small hangers.
customer_reviews.author: Christopher's Corner

customer_reviews.title: Just what I needed
customer_reviews.text: I have had a number of items just propped up against walls in my garage and this was a life saver. Took less than 15 minutes to install if you have proper tools. It holds so much that almost all items I had laying around are now stored neatly against a wall. I plan to purchase another at some point to spread things out, but for now I love this.
customer_reviews.author: Kristy Mecum

customer_reviews.title: Outstanding product
customer_reviews.text: This is designed to anchor to your studs. Do that and it's massively sturdy. The design holds a variety of tools and keeps them accessible. My shovels, rakes and long handled tools fit beautifully. My chainsaw does too. This is what I needed to organize my garage. Recommended.
customer_reviews.author: E. Simpson

customer_reviews.title: Rack NOT Manufactured Correctly
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this rack to hold all of the various tools as the photo would illustrate. The manufacturing was poor, I had to use a rubber mallet to hammer the brackets down the support bracket, they both would not just slide on. I would not recommend this product at all because of this fact. Price point should have been around $25.00 not the $70.00 plus. If I could add photos I would have.
customer_reviews.author: Roger Priest

customer_reviews.title: attachments do not hold tools securely
customer_reviews.text: While indeed a sturdy design overall, the attachments do not securely hold items such as pitch forks or even shovels. Specifically, my standard pitchfork will rotate 90 degrees and then fall from the long attachment, endangering those below. Would be a much better/safer item with intelligent re-design of the long attachments upward/narrower. Be careful when using this rack for items other than surf boards.
customer_reviews.author: john taylor

customer_reviews.title: Very sturdy and all tools fit well
customer_reviews.text: Only reason for 4/5 stars is they didn’t account for coating to add diameter to hole and the brackets for hanging where extremely hard to put on. We had to hammer them in place and this took off some of the finish. Very pleased with the product and ALL tools are off the floor!
customer_reviews.author: Debbie Stahr

customer_reviews.title: Great space saver -- really strong!
customer_reviews.text: Since I don't yet have a garden shed, I bought this to corral my tools in our very small garage. This thing (when mounted properly into studs) is really strong. It holds all my tools and blowers without a problem. I'm really impressed.
customer_reviews.author: E. Lloyd

customer_reviews.title: No anchors provided. Minimal installation instructions.
customer_reviews.text: The sturdiness of the product is excellent, however there are no anchors provided in the package. The anchors used for the size screws they give you require 1/2” pilot holes. Way too confusing of an installation for a simple storage rack. Do yourself a favor and just buy the Rubbermaid track system for half the cost and prevent making huge holes in your garage for no reason. The company should provide better hardware and instructions on a 90 dollar product. I was definitely not satisfied and will be returning the product.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great Tool Organizer!
customer_reviews.text: High quality and easy to install. The storage rack removes the clutter propped on the floor and adds easy access to all my shovels, rakes, hoes, and splitters/axes.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy
customer_reviews.text: So far so good. The piece is very sturdy and is holding all of my shovels, broom, rakes etc...... i am very pleased with this purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Yorda

customer_reviews.title: Pure Garbage
customer_reviews.text: Thank God for reviews. As noted holes do not align & mounting brackets do not fit bar. The lack of quality control is inexcusable. If I would have mounted this without checking the above I would be even more upset. Thanks for wasting my time!
customer_reviews.author: AML

customer_reviews.title: Great Tool Rack
customer_reviews.text: A great tool rack! Easy to install, and will hold up to 200 pounds of tools. The "hangers" may be placed at any point along the mounting rod, and then moved to a different point by pulling and reinserting a pin - well designed. I would recommend this tool rack to anyone that has a few feet of wall space and needs to get tools organized and off of the floor.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Very solid rack with great versatility.
customer_reviews.text: Heavy duty brackets and mounting hardware makes for a sturdy platform. The adjustable attachments with simple pin locking make for a versatile arrangement. I have 2 shovels, 3 rakes, a sledgehammer, an axe, a maul, a string trimmer, and some extension cords, and there is plenty of capacity left. I plan on ordering another one for additional capacity.
customer_reviews.author: Jimmy Paycheck

customer_reviews.title: Bes garden tool storage rack available anyway
customer_reviews.text: I looked at the half a dozen other choices and thought this was the best. I was pleasantly surprised when I received it and it really does do everything you could need in the world of storing garden tools
customer_reviews.author: Paul R.

customer_reviews.title: Great storage option
customer_reviews.text: I really like how customizable the setup is. You can change how far apart the prongs are. It seems to be able to hold a lot of weight as well. I’m really happy with it.
customer_reviews.author: Justin

customer_reviews.title: Met expectations
customer_reviews.text: Explanation of my ratings: Exceeds expectation 5 stars Met expectations 4 stars Met some not all 3 stars Mostly failed 2 stars Wish I skipped this purchase 1 star I add nothing more to evaluating
customer_reviews.author: Kenneth R.

customer_reviews.title: Disappointed
customer_reviews.text: I ordered the max for the longer storage hooks. Two of the longer hooks do not line up with the holes to secure them to the metal base making them useless. The shorter ones are fine. Its built well but needed the longer hooks for storage and now its become a paper weight.
customer_reviews.author: Chris

customer_reviews.title: Quality and sturdiness of the tool storage rack
customer_reviews.text: This storage rack far exceeded my expectations. The quality is great, it was easy to install and the storage capacity is much larger than I expected. I will be ordering another one, my wife wants on installed in the garage for her house cleaning tools. I would recommend this to anyone with yard tools or even house cleaning equipment.
customer_reviews.author: Larry

customer_reviews.title: Bought this for a wedding shower
customer_reviews.text: I bought this as a wedding shower gift off of the couples registry. Can't make much of a comment, the product was packaged well for delivery and it is fairly heavy. I would assume that it is sturdy. I am sure that they will be happy with their gift. Hard to give it a rating above but it seems like it will be a good product.
customer_reviews.author: Louise Dase

customer_reviews.title: Great Product!
customer_reviews.text: This rack delivers everything it promises and more. Very simple to assemble and install. Extremely sturdy - supports plenty of weight. We bought two of them and may buy more!
customer_reviews.author: Jean S.

customer_reviews.title: Fits a ton of tools on it
customer_reviews.text: I was pleased with how many tools I can put on this thing Its a space saver for my garage It was as ez as abc to set up Worth the investment would recommend spending the money on this organizer
customer_reviews.author: brett miller

customer_reviews.title: Worked as advertised....
customer_reviews.text: I really enjoy the fact I have no shovels and rakes laying all over the place in my garage. The pins to the holders lined up easily enough and mounting was a breeze once I drilled pilot holes into the studs. Estimated time for full install was about 30 minutes because I took my time with leveling and marking out rack placement. No issues.
customer_reviews.author: S. Gonzalez

customer_reviews.title: Easy Install, Great Product
customer_reviews.text: I'm happy with this purchase. Installation was pretty easy and the parts seem to be made of decent material. It may be a bit overpriced for what it is but the product meets what I need it to do.
customer_reviews.author: Eric S

customer_reviews.title: Works great
customer_reviews.text: Installed in under :30. Recommend a level, stud finder, drill, socket set and pencil. Filled dead space in garage and with deep hooks holds a lot more than Gladiator hooks. Very customizable for what you need.
customer_reviews.author: Larry W.

customer_reviews.title: Well thought out, strong, Quality Product.
customer_reviews.text: WOW holds it all! Quality product. Easy install on my concrete wall with proper fasteners. Much better to have my shovels and takes off the floor.
customer_reviews.author: Robert P Mancuso Jr.

customer_reviews.title: Perfect & the UP ⬆️ Is important!
customer_reviews.text: The system was easy to install but all my tools slide forward😠 After reading the instructions last night my husband sees the comment about UP word on the brackets. So today he turned the brackets around and everything is now hanging perfect! So the UP bracket placement is VERY important!
customer_reviews.author: Judy J. Davezac

customer_reviews.title: I recommend it
customer_reviews.text: This has simplified my garage so much. Such a space saver and was very easy to install.
customer_reviews.author: Adrienne C.

customer_reviews.title: Board garage utility holder
customer_reviews.text: Would recamend...love how easy it was to install and how strong it was! Looks great too! It held all we needed to hang and room for more:)
customer_reviews.author: Suzanne R Crouse

customer_reviews.title: Recommend
customer_reviews.text: A little pricey than other products but love the quality and design. just as described it is capable to hold weights and great organize the tools. My garage looks neat now. I am happy This purchase. Will come back get more.
customer_reviews.author: JJ

customer_reviews.title: Simple, sturdy space saving tool rack!!
customer_reviews.text: Great heavy duty, space saving rack for yard tools! My storage room is rather small. This tool rack allowed me to get all my yard tools off of the floor and stored on the wall in an small, easy to reach space. It was he perfect solution for me.
customer_reviews.author: Cindy

customer_reviews.title: Love Omni products
customer_reviews.text: I have purchased a lot of racks over the years but trust me when I say this is the best designed and best made. I now have their bike rack, tool rack and ski rack. Super easy to install, adjustable and super strong and well made.
customer_reviews.author: Koveh

customer_reviews.title: Great design & srtength of universal garden tool rack.
customer_reviews.text: Trouble with the pins going through bottom hole of brackets. Drilled out to 5/16". No instruction sheet. Like the design, strength & quality.
customer_reviews.author: RV-n-Smokies

customer_reviews.title: very sturdy rack
customer_reviews.text: perhaps over engineered for tools, this is a very sturdy rack. I have another omni rack for storing bikes on the wall. It is essentially the same base rack, with different attachments. both are great, as long as you can find studs to ensure the rack is load bearing.
customer_reviews.author: Galen

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy and easy to install
customer_reviews.text: Easy to install and looks awesome. I thought it was a little expensive but after installing you can tell that it is high quality.
customer_reviews.author: Justin

customer_reviews.title: Almost perfect.
customer_reviews.text: Plenty of hooks, very sturdy, and easy to install. My only complaint is that my rack is a little crowded with larger tools like rakes, and a push broom. It holds all my tools just fine, but adding and removing tools is a bit of a pain. The wall rail is 46". I think a length closer to 60" would be perfect for the number of hooks provided.
customer_reviews.author: Eric A

customer_reviews.title: Solid buy
customer_reviews.text: Sturdy, flexible, durable, convenient. It hold a ton of stuff and can easily be placed where I want. Be creative to get larger items on it.
customer_reviews.author: ThatsMe

customer_reviews.title: Great organizing tool
customer_reviews.text: Sturdy, easy to install organizational feature. I had a rolling tool rack that took up too much space in my crowded garage. This was the perfect tool for storing rakes, shovels, hedge clippers, etc.
customer_reviews.author: Barbara G. Bonfield

customer_reviews.title: GREAT GARDEN TOOL HOLDER
customer_reviews.text: Great heavy duty storage rack. Holds lots of tools. Great for keeping dangerous gardening tools safely out of the way.
customer_reviews.author: BOCA LADY

customer_reviews.title: Holds more than I expected.
customer_reviews.text: I had intended it for a different usage, but ended up putting more items than I originally planned.
customer_reviews.author: ACE

customer_reviews.title: Functional
customer_reviews.text: Just what I needed for my garage. It holds my shovels, rakes and other gardening tools, getting things off the floor and keeping things organized.
customer_reviews.author: Pam

customer_reviews.title: Well made, HD.
customer_reviews.text: Well made, really heavy duty. Quick and easy change for tool arrangements.
customer_reviews.author: ESAD

customer_reviews.title: Very heavy duty storage rack
customer_reviews.text: This rack might be stronger than the lag bolts I used to mount it. I can fit all my yard tools on it, including a reel mower, weedeater and a dolly. The arms are long enough to hang several items on each. Exactly as advertised and installed in minutes.
customer_reviews.author: cmadtex

customer_reviews.title: Solid Rack
customer_reviews.text: Very easy to install and very sturdy. One of the hooks didn't attach, so I contacted the seller and they next day delivered the replacement part without an issue. Superb customer service and now a complete and superb rack! Will Order from them again.
customer_reviews.author: Jarron

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: Arrived complete, easy to install, very sturdy. My only complaint is that you pay for 6 hanging accessories and unless you are using child size tools you can’t get more that 4 up on the rack. Not the usual problem having too much of anything.
customer_reviews.author: Gregory W Tipton

customer_reviews.title: Easy, High capacity
customer_reviews.text: Easy to install and great capacity - can hang stuff 2-3 deep, with little-used items in back.
customer_reviews.author: BGM328i

customer_reviews.title: Amazing product!
customer_reviews.text: Amzing!! Had to have my neighbor help with installation since I don’t have sn impact driver with socket driver set. I recommend that kit should inlcude the necessary socket piece. Else, this is an amazing product. I am ordering 1 or 2 more!!
customer_reviews.author: Jesse

customer_reviews.title: Wrong Parts
customer_reviews.text: The design and installation were easy enough, but I did not receive the hangers in the product pictures. I received five large hooks, which is not what I wanted.
customer_reviews.author: OK Valley #1 Online Basketball Guru

customer_reviews.title: Poor construction makes this install a nightmare
customer_reviews.text: Bar is supposed to "slide" through mounting brackets but holes in brackets are much too small. Was able to advance the bar through one of the brackets with the aid of a mallet. Ten minutes of banging resulted in 3-4 inches put through.
customer_reviews.author: Cristen Floyd

customer_reviews.title: Exactly what my garage needed!
customer_reviews.text: Well worth it. Very sturdy. Holds alot of my hand tools, including shovels, rakes, brooms, you name it. If I had more tools, I'd get another one.
customer_reviews.author: Matt R

customer_reviews.title: Good product
customer_reviews.text: Very impressed with the quality of this product, installed in about 10 minutes, very happy
customer_reviews.author: rick stoeckel

customer_reviews.title: Heavy duty tool storage
customer_reviews.text: Well made, heavy duty, well packaged. Very happy with this choice.
customer_reviews.author: Linda D.

customer_reviews.title: Good product, great quality, easy to install!
customer_reviews.text: This product is great! I'm not the handiest guy on the planet and with a few easy steps it is up on the wall and I organized all my tools conveniently in one location. Helped me free up a lot of floor space in my garage and I'm looking at other products that they offer to clean up the rest of my garage. From bike racks to sports racks, they got it all!
customer_reviews.author: Matthew D. Scherer

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy and plenty of space
customer_reviews.text: This is a great product. It is sturdy and has plenty of space for what I needed it to hold. The excess painting of the brackets and the main pole made the pole not fit easily at all. I ended up having to file down the paint and some metal on the brackets for the bar to fit well.
customer_reviews.author: BGODDA

customer_reviews.title: Everything expected and more!
customer_reviews.text: The storage capabilities of this product were pretty obvious from the description, but the ease of installation and customization was a pleasant surprise. The design is simple but elegant. This unit is incredibly sturdy and strong--the only limitation I can see would be end-user incompetence.
customer_reviews.author: jenver

customer_reviews.title: Organizational Item
customer_reviews.text: My husband is extremely happy and impressed with the quality of this item.
customer_reviews.author: Pamela Gatto

customer_reviews.title: fantastic
customer_reviews.text: I bought this rack because I needed to get the tools off the floor in my garage. The design is very sturdy the fit on the end brackets were very tight and they have to be for no slop in the bar. The pin holes for the hooks are tight also it takes a little persuading to get them aligned , I am very happy with the tools now organized
customer_reviews.author: strez1

customer_reviews.title: Nothing fit right.
customer_reviews.text: Mine went together horribly, none of the holes lined up and nothing fit right. I had to make it all fit together to make it work. Don’t know if they had a bad batch of them or not.
customer_reviews.author: Matt8027

customer_reviews.title: Well designed
customer_reviews.text: The square hole in the brackets are angled so the forks are slightly angled upward. Sturdy and well designed. Holding several heavy Li battery tools without problem.
customer_reviews.author: TS

customer_reviews.title: Space saver for the garage
customer_reviews.text: Easy to hang and holds a number of tools up and out of the way. I put mine high enough that I can store things under it in containers but still reach the tools.
customer_reviews.author: Holly

customer_reviews.title: excellent
customer_reviews.text: this is a great product and spacing saving device. If you have a lot of hand tools, rakes, shovels, etc, this is the product for home.
customer_reviews.author: D. bryant

customer_reviews.title: It’s awesome, I am completely happy with this
customer_reviews.text: I love this thing! It’s sturdy and high quality. Works exactly like the pictures. Completely worth the price. I would highly recommend this!
customer_reviews.author: Amy Nicole

customer_reviews.title: Great tool hanger
customer_reviews.text: Great hanger. Was able to put up all my hard tools and get them off the ground.
customer_reviews.author: Patty no name

customer_reviews.title: This is heavy duty and very easy to install
customer_reviews.text: This is heavy duty and very easy to install. Love the ability to move the and adjust the hooks. Highly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: tnbelle

customer_reviews.title: Organizational tool rack
customer_reviews.text: The tool rack was purchased as a wedding gift for my grandson and fiancé. They haven't received the gift yet so I can't report their thoughts. I did examine the tool rack and it seems to be made of a durable material. It arrive on time to give it to them at their up-coming wedding shower.
customer_reviews.author: Linda

customer_reviews.title: Nice Rack!
customer_reviews.text: Great product. I liked Omni racks so much I bought a second one for tools, two for our bikes and two for folding chairs. The garage never looked better
customer_reviews.author: GINA L MINAS

customer_reviews.title: Best tool storage
customer_reviews.text: We have had several different tool storage racks in different houses over the years and this is the best. It is very sturdy and holds a lot of tools.
customer_reviews.author: Ccm

customer_reviews.title: Great Storage Rack
customer_reviews.text: Got this for my husband ( and secretly for myself) and it did prompt my hubby to clean up and organize the garage. He got a lot of our tools, rakes, brooms, etc. hung and this rack works perfectly!
customer_reviews.author: Sunny

customer_reviews.title: Very Sturdy!
customer_reviews.text: Sturdy and convenient! Installed very quick. Holds all my tools with ease. Would definitely buy again. It holds all my heavy tools with no worry of falling.
customer_reviews.author: Randall

customer_reviews.title: Great storage rack!
customer_reviews.text: This was very simple to assemble and put up. Looks really great and holds all my garden tools and could also hold more!
customer_reviews.author: Ryan White

customer_reviews.title: Very satisfied!
customer_reviews.text: In fact, I'm ordering a second one... I just can't decide if I want the long hooks or the short hooks... maybe the mix again. The way the main rod slides in the wall brackets makes it easier to install and level than I expected... and gives some wiggle-room depending on where your studs are located.
customer_reviews.author: Cory R.

product_meta.title: StoreYourBoard Omni Tool Storage Rack, Max, Wall Mount Tools Home and Garage Storage System, Steel Gear Hanger
feature_bullets: HEAVY DUTY STEEL: built from steel to hold up to 200 lbs of gear!
INCLUDES 6 STORAGE ATTACHMENTS: 4 large attachments (11" long, 2" wide) and 2 small attachments (5" long, 2.5" wide)
CUSTOMIZE TOOL STORAGE: insert attachments to 46" long wall track in custom setup to fit the gear and tools you have in your home, garage, shop, or store
WHAT GEAR & TOOLS WILL IT HOLD? Rakes, shovels, ladders, hammers, backpacks, skateboards, helmets, and more
EXCLUSIVE PATENT PENDING DESIGN: built to hold everything in your garage, and built to last!

specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.5 out of 5 stars512 ratings4.5 out of 5 stars
